home.title: Welcome to FloodSafeDearborn
home.description: FloodSafeDearborn provides real-time flood information and resources to residents of Dearborn, Michigan. It helps residents stay informed about flood risks, emergency routes, and preparedness resources, aiming to protect homes, businesses, and communities from the dangers of flooding.

sections.Interactive Flood Map: View real-time flooding hotspots reported by community members.
sections.Customizable Notifications: Set up personalized alerts to notify you of flooding near your address.
sections.Historical Data: Access historical flooding data to understand flood-prone areas better.
sections.Emergency Resources: Find contact information for local authorities and tips for flood protection and emergency response.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Find contact details for flood-related concerns in Dearborn. Contact Dearborn City Hall or Wayne County Drain Commissioner for assistance with drainage and flood prevention projects.

about.title: About FloodSafeDearborn
about.description: FloodSafeDearborn is a platform aimed at providing real-time flood information and resources to residents of Dearborn, Michigan. The mission is to enhance community awareness, help with flood preparedness, and mitigate flood risks.

features.Customizable Notifications: Receive alerts about flooding incidents within your chosen radius.
features.Community Reporting: Report flooding incidents to help others stay informed.

safety_tips.title: Flood Safety Tips
safety_tips.description: Learn essential tips to protect yourself, your home, and your community from flooding.

Protecting Yourself: Monitor weather reports and flood alerts.
Prepare an emergency kit with essentials.
Evacuate early if advised by authorities.
Protecting Your Home: Install sump pumps and waterproof your basement.
Elevate electrical appliances and clear gutters.
